::Feline::
She tried to move out of the way of the blade, but wasn't fast 
enough.  The blade cut a two inch slice into her side.  She screamed 
in pain and dived out and away from Blender.  She got up on all fours 
and fired her optic lazars at Blender.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Blender skids to a halt as Feline (Sorry about the KitKat thing) 
slashes at
> his legs. He yells and kneels down, bringing the blade thrust down 
towards
> her...
